meanings.definition: A person or thing that summarizes.
meanings.sent1: The summarizer quickly explained the main points of the story.
meanings.sent2: I used a summarizer to help me understand the article better.
meanings.sent3: The summarizer robot made everyone laugh by simplifying the complex report.
meanings.sent4: Her brain worked like a summarizer, distilling the details into key facts.
meanings.sent5: The summarizer was like a magic wand, turning long texts into short summaries.

meanings.definition: A tool or software that condenses information into a concise form.
meanings.sent1: The online summarizer helped me shorten my essay.
meanings.sent2: I rely on the summarizer to save time when reading lengthy documents.
meanings.sent3: The summarizer app made the data look like a tiny puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The summarizer functioned like a virtual assistant, organizing the content neatly.
meanings.sent5: The summarizer was a lifesaver, making my research much more manageable.
